name: Ball Thrower
description:
Hello people,

I am a 13 year old game developer.  So this is just a game I made for fun. Btw some of my friends helped in feedback. Thanks to Radha Jha and Adhip Singh.

This game is terrible I know but......just try it :) Comment your highest score. And see you with another terrible project soon. 

Your lovely,

Swarajthegreat
